Title: TaskWeaver has Protection Mechanism Failure and Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF)
Description:
This vulnerability allows a user to escape the container network isolation and access the hostâ€™s local services (127.0.0.1 bound on the host).
The vulnerability is applicable only on the MacOS and Windows environments while using Docker Desktop, Containerd on Lima VM, or Podman.
